verses.verse: Now it came to pass in the fourteenth<WH702> <WH6240> year<WH8141> of king<WH4428> Hezekiah<WH2396>, that Sennacherib<WH5576> king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> came up<WH5927> against all the defenced<WH1219> cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063>, and took<WH8610> them.
